programme.title: Honey Boy
programme.desc: Comédien enchaînant les projets, Otis a un problème d’alcool. Un jour, il a un accident de voiture. Arrêté, il doit suivre une cure de désintoxication dans le centre du docteur Moreno. Pour la thérapie, cette dernière lui demande de noter ses souvenirs. Otis repense alors à sa vie avec son père, un ancien clown alcoolique et violent, qui lui faisait office d’agent. Ils vivaient ensemble dans une chambre de motel. Au centre, Otis a du mal à participer aux activités de groupe, persuadé que la thérapie ne pourra pas l’aider. Il se replonge toutefois dans son passé.

programme.title: Scènes de la vie conjugale
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 Acte trois : la vallée de larmes

programme.title: Scènes de la vie conjugale
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 Acte quatre : les illetrés

programme.title: Scènes de la vie conjugale
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Acte Cinq : En Pleine nuit, dans une maison obscure quelque part sur terre..

programme.title: Larry et son nombril
programme.sub-title: S11 E8 Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait ?

programme.title: Des hommes et des dieux
programme.desc: Dans les années 1990, en Algérie, un moine, Christian, et sept condisciples vivent dans les montagnes de l'Atlas. Entre les prières, ils s'activent pour le bien de la communauté et des habitants, notamment Luc, médecin, qui les reçoit en consultation. Quand plusieurs travailleurs étrangers sont massacrés par un groupe islamiste, la tension s'installe. L'armée propose de les protéger mais Christian refuse.

programme.title: Le temps des égarés
programme.desc: Sira travaille comme traductrice pour l'Ofpra, l'organisme français qui gère les demandes d'asile. Sans scrupules, elle profite de sa position pour extorquer des fonds aux réfugiés qui passent par elle. En échange, elle leur propose un récit de vie qui convaincra à coup sûr les autorités. Un jour, elle trouve devant chez elle une petite Africaine dont le père a été arrêté. De son côté, Abdul a fui l'Irak et les combattants de Daesh. Il arrive en France dans un container avec d'autres clandestins et rejoint Jean-Paul, un ami photographe, qui accepte de l'accueillir le temps de ses démarches.

programme.title: Une vie après
programme.desc: Ne ressentant plus rien pour Lucas, son mari, Marion, quadragénaire, décide de le quitter. Mais la jeune femme se retrouve face à une difficulté. Pour obtenir la garde alternée de son fils de 7 ans, cette ancienne sportive de haut niveau doit trouver son premier emploi. Dominique, qui a croisé une fois Marion en discothèque, n'aime également plus sa femme. Mais il ne parvient pas à franchir le pas.

programme.title: Le goût du partage
programme.desc: Victor, 65 ans, est un grand chef reconnu. On vient de toute la France pour déguster sa cuisine. Lors d’un rendez-vous médical, son généraliste décèle une grave maladie au cœur. Le restaurateur n’a plus longtemps à vivre et il doit se ménager. Victor se met alors en quête d’un successeur. Ses recherches l’amènent à rencontrer Annabelle qui a, comme lui, le goût de la cuisine et un fichu caractère.

programme.title: The Square
programme.desc: Christian, conservateur d'un musée d'art moderne de Stockholm, répond, après avoir passé une courte nuit, aux questions d'Anne, journaliste de télévision américaine. Peu de temps après, l'élégant quadragénaire se fait voler son téléphone portable en pleine rue. Il se rend ensuite à une réunion pour préparer la communication autour d'une future exposition, intitulée «The Square», qui doit questionner le public sur son rapport à l'altruisme. Dans la journée, aidé par son assistant Michael, il parvient à retrouver le signal émis par le GPS de son téléphone.

programme.title: White Riot
programme.desc: A la fin des années 1970, l'Angleterre est traversée par plusieurs mouvements. D'un côté, des politiciens d'extrême-droite, parmi lesquels ceux du National Front, militent clairement pour une Angleterre blanche, de l'autre, des artistes et des musiciens s'opposent frontalement à ces positions. parmi eux, Red Saunders, photographe depuis toujours politiquement engagé, a décidé de créer un mouvement, le Rock Against Racism. Devant la caméra de Rubikah Shah, il revient sur la situation politique du pays à l'époque, et sur l'influence que les Clash ont eue sur lui.

programme.title: Blue Valentine
programme.desc: Dean et Cindy se sont aimés dès qu'ils se sont vus. La jeune femme vivait alors une relation tumultueuse avec Bobby, son petit ami de l'époque. Dean a su la séduire et la réconforter. Des années plus tard, leur couple bat sérieusement de l'aile. Dean n'est plus que l'ombre de lui-même. Sa femme, qui le tenait en haute estime, se désole de son manque d'ambition au point qu'elle ne supporte plus sa présence.

programme.title: Virgin Secrets
programme.desc: Melissa Moody, enceinte de plusieurs mois, vient se présenter au domicile des Chase. Elle est reçue par Charlene et Philip, la mère et le frère cadet de Ronnie, mort cinq ans plus tôt. Melissa, qui n'a connu que Ronnie, affirme que le bébé qu'elle attend est de lui. Totalement incrédule et toujours affectée par la mort de son fils, Charlene renvoie aussitôt Melissa, qui part trouver refuge chez Bill et Gail Erwin. Le couple s'occupe de la jeune femme depuis qu'elle est en froid avec ses parents, effrayés par sa crise mystique.

programme.title: Yi-Yi
programme.desc: Lors du mariage de son beau-frère A-di à Taipei, N.J., cadre informaticien pétri de regrets, retrouve son amour de jeunesse Sherry. Il réalise qu'il est toujours amoureux d'elle? Mais aujourd'hui, N.J., la quarantaine, est marié à Min-min et père de deux adorables enfants Yang-yang et Ting-ting. Soudain, sa belle-mère, prise d'un malaise, s'effondre. Elle tombe dans le coma. La famille se relaie à son chevet.

programme.title: Mud
programme.desc: Ellis et Neckbone, deux adolescents inséparables, échappent à la surveillance parentale pour une balade en bateau sur le Mississippi. Les deux garçons accostent sur une petite île et ne tardent pas à investir l'épave d'un bateau, logée en haut d'un arbre, qu'ils ont récemment découverte. Ils rencontrent bientôt Mud, un fugitif qui vit dans l'épave. Poursuivi par des chasseurs de primes, ce dernier leur demande de l'aide, en attendant de retrouver sa petite amie, Juniper. Le lendemain, Ellis et Neckbone aperçoivent la jeune femme en ville.

programme.title: Sympathie pour le diable
programme.desc: En novembre 1992, la ville de Sarajevo, assiégée depuis sept mois, est exsangue. Dans la cité, qui subit une pluie quotidienne d'obus, le journaliste Paul Marchand plonge régulièrement au coeur du conflit pour alimenter en information diverses radios francophones. Toujours accompagné par le fidèle Vincent, reporter photographe, le jeune homme prend tous les risques pour accomplir sa mission d'information. En compagnie de Boba, leur traductrice, les deux journalistes partent interviewer des responsables militaires serbes.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: Sonic, le film
programme.desc: Sonic, un hérisson bleu qui court à une vitesse incroyable, est poursuivi dans les rues de San Francisco par le docteur Ivo Robotnik, un scientifique fou et moustachu. La créature se souvient alors de son enfance, sur une île très lointaine, protégé par le hibou Longclaw. C'est ce même Longclaw qui va envoyer Sonic sur Terre alors que sa vie est menacée par d'inquiétantes créatures. Dix années passent et le hérisson vit désormais dans la petite ville de Green Hillsl, en plein coeur du Montana, où il multiplie les records de vitesse sur les routes, intrigant le policier Tom Wachowski.

programme.title: Les Trolls
programme.desc: Pendant longtemps, les trolls, de petites créatures colorées, vivaient heureux dans les arbres de la forêt où ils passaient leur temps à chanter, danser et à se faire des câlins. Jusqu'au jour où ils ont été découverts par les bergen, des monstres sinistres et géants, qui ont découvert qu'ils pouvaient être heureux en mangeant des trolls. Vingt ans ont passé et les trolls vivent cachés dans la forêt, sous la houlette du roi Peppy et de sa fille, la joyeuse princesse Poppy. Parmi eux, Branche, beaucoup moins joyeux, car il vit dans la crainte permanente que les bergen ne trouvent leur cachette.

programme.title: Le secret des Kennedy
programme.desc: Frère de John et Bob Kennedy, Ted participe à une régate le week-end du 18 juillet 1969 sur l'île de Chappaquiddick. Après la course, le sénateur du Massachusetts se rend à une fête où sont présents, son cousin et les secrétaires qui ont participé à la campagne présidentielle de Bob Kennedy avant qu'il ne soit assassiné. Avec l'une d'entre-elle, Ted part faire une balade en voiture. Sur la route, il rate un virage et le véhicule tombe dans l'eau. Il en ressort vivant mais pas la secrétaire. Paniqué, Ted préfère prévenir son cousin plutôt que les secours.

programme.title: Madame Claude
programme.desc: A Paris, à la fin des années 1960, Fernande Grudet est à la tête d'une maison close très réputée. Plus connue sous le pseudonyme de Madame Claude, elle dirige avec rigueur et fermeté son établissement, discret mais fréquenté par des personnalités, des policiers et parfois même des politiques. Elle applique la même fermeté quand elle choisit ses nouvelles prostituées. Parmi ses nouvelle recrues, une jeune femme se distingue nettement : Sidonie, venue de la bonne société, dotée d'un bon carnet d'adresse et d'une forte personnalité, séduit rapidement Madame Claude.

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: Employé dans un grand cabinet juridique new-yorkais, Michael Clayton arrange discrètement les histoires embarrassantes de clients fortunés. Bientôt, il doit gérer le cas d'un collègue dont le comportement pose problème. Dans une affaire qui oppose une multinationale à des fermiers victimes de produits dangereux, Arthur Edens semble avoir pris le parti des plaignants au lieu de défendre les intérêts de la firme.

programme.title: Enragé
programme.desc: Par une nuit pluvieuse, un homme s'introduit dans un pavillon de banlieue, en tue les occupants avant de mettre le feu à la maison.. Plus tard, Rachel, sur le point de divorcer et en retard au travail, conduit un peu vite pour emmener son fils à l'école avant se rendre au bureau. C'est alors qu'elle klaxonne de façon intempestive avant de doubler la voiture située devant elle. Seulement, le conducteur de cette voiture est l'assassin, un homme passablement perturbé, qui n'apprécie pas cette incivilité.

programme.title: Les liens du sang
programme.desc: Dans les années 1970, François, jeune et brillant policier, apprend que son frère aîné, Gabriel, va sortir de prison après dix ans d'incarcération pour meurtre. François décide d'épauler Gabriel, lui prête une chambre et lui trouve un emploi. Dans le même temps, il tombe amoureux de Corinne, compagne d'un truand qu'il a arrêté. Gabriel, lui, essaie d'entamer une nouvelle vie mais il subit plusieurs échecs.

programme.title: L'élève Ducobu
programme.desc: L'élève Ducobu n'aime pas l'école. Pour la énième fois, il s'est fait renvoyer et doit s'inscrire dans un nouvel établissement. Le premier jour, il y fait la connaissance de ses camarades, dont la jeune Léonie Gratin, première de la classe. Il rencontre aussi son professeur, le strict et colérique monsieur Latouche. Spécialiste de la triche, Ducobu parvient pour une fois à se faire passer pour un bon élève.

programme.title: Les vacances de Ducobu
programme.desc: Ravi de partir en vacances avec son père, Ducobu déchante. Il se retrouve en effet dans le même camping que Léonie, la meilleure élève de l'école. Son instituteur, monsieur Latouche, y passe lui aussi son été. Lors d'une sortie, Ducobu apprend qu'un trésor est caché dans une île voisine. Il est persuadé de pouvoir le découvrir. De son côté, Latouche est terriblement jaloux d'Esteban, l'animateur du club d'enfants.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Famille n'est pas un mot, c'est une phrase

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 TBT, comme ils disent

programme.title: The Song of Names
programme.desc: Juste avant que la Seconde Guerre mondiale éclate, Dovidl Rapoport, un jeune virtuose polonais d'origine juive, est confié à une famille bourgeoise londonienne. D'abord jaloux, Martin, le fils unique des Simmonds, finit par se lier d'amitié avec lui. En 1951, juste avant un concert important, Dovidl, alors âgé de 21 ans, disparaît sans laisser de traces. Des décennies plus tard, Martin, devenu critique musical, est toujours à sa recherche. Un jour, il pense tenir une piste quand il voit un jeune violoniste tenir son archet de la même manière que Dovidl.

programme.title: L'affaire Percy
programme.desc: En 1998, Percy Schmeiser cultivateur de colza depuis des décennies dans le Saskatchewan canadien, reçoit un courrier de la société Monsanto, lui demandant de verser la somme de 19 000 dollars pour l'utilisation de semences brevetées. Percy, qui a toujours refusé d'en utiliser, est convaincu que ces semences ont accidentellement été intégrées à ses cultures par un cultivateur voisin. L'agriculteur, qui refuse de se laisser impressionner par la puissante firme, fait appel à Jackson Weaver, d'un modeste cabinet d'avocats, pour le représenter en justice.

programme.title: Nos futurs
programme.desc: Yann Kerbec mène une existence trop bien rangée, entre un poste de cadre à responsabilités dans une société d'assurances vie et sa vie avec son épouse, Estelle, parfaite. Après sa fête d'anniversaire, il décide de reprendre contact avec Thomas, un camarade de lycée. Au contraire de Yann, Thomas semble n'avoir absolument pas changé. Il est resté le jeune homme amusant et inconséquent qu'il était à l'époque.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Écrivain égoïste dépourvu d'esprit de famille, Alexandre perd son père, Jacques, foudroyé par une crise cardiaque. Mais Jacques ne disparaît pas vraiment et se manifeste à son fils sous la forme d'un fantôme avec lequel il dialogue en permanence. Tandis que les relations familiales se compliquent, tout le monde s'inquiète des changements de comportements d'Alexandre.

programme.title: M. Peabody et Sherman : Les voyages dans le temps
programme.desc: M.. Peabody n'est pas un chien comme les autres. C'est un inventeur de génie. Père adoptif de Sherman, un petit garçon, il a imaginé une machine à voyager dans le temps afin de lui enseigner l'histoire. A Versailles, en 1789, Sherman et Peabody sont poursuivis par des révolutionnaires mais réussissent à échapper à la guillotine. Lors de son premier jour d'école, Sherman subit les brimades de la petite Penny. Peabody organise alors un dîner pour que les deux enfants fassent la paix. Mais durant la soirée, Penny monte dans la machine à voyager dans le temps et disparaît au temps des pharaons.

programme.title: Shaun le mouton
programme.desc: Shaun, un jeune mouton, grandit dans une petite ferme tenue par un éleveur aussi sympathique que myope. Mais, les journées puis les années passent, un peu répétitives et Shaun rêve de changer d'air. Avec d'autres animaux, le mouton organise un plan d'évasion. Après avoir détourné, avec l'aide précieuse du canard, l'attention de Blitzer, le chien de berger, Shaun et les autres moutons parviennent à endormir le fermier. Mais leur plan dérape et la caravane dans laquelle le fermier est endormi dévale la route. Blitzer tente alors de la rattraper. Peu de temps après, les moutons, livrés à eux-mêmes, comprennent qu'ils ont besoin du fermier. Shaun part en ville pour le retrouver.

programme.title: Sécurité rapprochée
programme.desc: Employé de la CIA, Matt Weston est chargé de surveiller un des locaux secrets de l'agence au Cap, en Afrique du Sud. Lassé du peu d'intérêt de sa mission, il aspire à plus de responsabilités. Au même moment, Tobin Frost, ex-agent accusé de vendre des renseignements confidentiels, est arrêté non loin de là. Il est conduit dans la planque que surveille Matt. Bientôt, un commando armé prend le local d’assaut.

programme.title: The Big Short : le casse du siècle
programme.desc: Dans les années 1970, le métier de banquier n'était pas particulièrement à la mode, jusqu'à l'intervention de Lewis Ranieri, qui a mis à la mode les obligations hypothécaires. Un frénésie s'est emparée de la finance pendant une trentaine d'années, jusqu'à un arrêt brutal avec la crise mondiale de 2008. Jared Vennett explique comment un analyste financier et des investisseurs de Wall Street ont senti le vent tourner et parié sur l'échec d'un système voué à s'effondrer.

programme.title: Cyril contre Goliath
programme.desc: Dans son appartement parisien entouré de ses enfants, l'écrivain Cyril Montana se souvient du village de Lacoste, dans le Luberon, où il passait enfant ses vacances d'été. Il se souvient aussi que ce village, dominé par le château du Marquis de Sade, a beaucoup intéressé le créateur et homme d'affaires Pierre Cardin, qui, en 2000, a commencé à y racheter le château, puis des maisons, jusqu'à 40, et des commerces, afin de le transformer en lieu culturel. Seulement ces acquisitions ne débouchent pas sur grand-chose et Lacoste est devenu peu à peu un village-musée.

programme.title: The Passenger
programme.desc: Michael MacCauley, agent en assurances consciencieux dans une entreprise new yorkaise, mène une vie très bien réglée, rythmée par ses trajets quotidiens en train de banlieue. Alors qu'il vient d'apprendre qu'il était renvoyé après dix ans de bons et loyaux services, Michael, ancien policier, rejoint Alex, un ex-collègue dans un bar, avant de reprendre le train pour sa maison en banlieue. C'est au cours du trajet qu'il est interpellé par une femme mystérieuse, Joanna, qui lui propose de se livrer à une étrange expérience.

programme.title: Un heureux événement
programme.desc: Etudiante en philosophie, Barbara Dray fait la connaissance de Nicolas Malle, qui travaille dans un vidéoclub. Il parvient à la séduire et ils s'installent ensemble. Lors de vacances, Nicolas convainc Barbara de faire un bébé. Un jour, la jeune femme annonce à Nicolas qu'elle est enceinte. Pendant sa grossesse, Barbara passe par tous les états. Et vient enfin le jour de l'accouchement, qui se déroule sans encombre. Mais c'est le début d'une véritable détresse pour Barbara, qui ne parvient pas à se faire à cette nouvelle vie.

programme.title: Boule & Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: Thalasso
programme.desc: Cinq ans après avoir été kidnappé, l'écrivain Michel Houellebecq doit prendre soin de sa santé vacillante après trop d'excès de boisson et se rend dans un centre de thalassothérapie. Les soins, l'interdiction de fumer et le régime sans alcool obligatoires ne l'enchantent guère. Tout comme l'acteur Gérard Depardieu, patient également, et avec lequel il se lie d'amitié. Ensemble, ils boivent en cachette, se racontent des choses intimes et parlent religion, philosophie et politique. Leur séjour est chamboulé quand des amis de l'écrivain lui demandent un service.

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: Aussi calme et placide que professionnel, Walter Kikamba est agent de sécurité dans un supermarché tenu par José Perez, un personnage assez peu recommandable. Alors que l'établissement est en train de fermer, Samir, se faisant passer pour un client, parvient à se dissimuler dans le magasin, afin d'aider son chef de bande Goran et leurs complices à s'y introduire de nuit. Walter a rejoint sa femme Laurence et leurs enfants, quand son téléphone sonne : l'alarme du supermarché s'est déclenchée et il doit s'y rendre pour vérifier que tout va bien. Quand il arrive sur les lieux, Goran et sa bande sont déjà là.

programme.title: Dexter
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 3: Dexter (Michael C. Hall) ist seinem nächstem Opfer auf der Spur, einem frisch entlassenem Mörder, der anscheinend wieder töten will, als er von Debra zum jüngsten Tatort des Kühlwagen-Killers gerufen wird. In einem Eishockey-Stadion wurden die Überreste einer Prostituierten gefunden. Lieutenant LaGuerta schreibt den Nachtwächter zur Fahndung aus, aber ist er wirklich der Killer? - Nervenzerrende, sarkastische Krimiserie um einen Ermittler mit blutigem Doppelleben. 49 Min.USA 2007. Von Michael Cuesta, mit Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter.Ab 16 Jahren.

programme.desc: The Pacific: With James Badge Dale, Joseph Mazzello, Jon Seda, Ashton Holmes. The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Bgb217","dateCreated":"2002-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent, one of the best shows I've ever seen.","reviewBody":"It's hard to describe to those who haven't watched this brilliant show what it's like. Six Feet Under is simply in my opinion, the best hour on television, and one of the best shows ever. Of all time. Brilliantly written, brilliantly told, brilliantly acted, brilliantly brilliant. I've never used brilliant so much in a review before. 

 First off, it's a show about a very real family, with very real issues to deal with. The family, who have just recently lost the father consists of the mother Ruth, two sons Nate and David, and sister Claire. The two brothers run the business prviously owned by the father, a funeral parlor. I just love this show. There is not a single bad actor on the show, in every role. The family is probably one of the most real ever portrayed on TV, the characters being all easily relatable to, I myself can relate to two of them in particular. It's fresh, at times funny, at times sad, at times everything. Every single actor is amazing in their roles from Brenda to David to Keith to Ruth to Frederico to everybody. And the story lines are just so brilliant, dealing with life and it's purpose, seen throught the eyes of these people who work with death in a funeral home. It's just amazing.

 I could rave on and on for hours about how great this show is and how much I love it, but I have to stop sometime. If you haven't yet watched Six Feet Under please do yourself a favor and do. I love it and it's one of my all time favorite shows. Simply, yes, you guessed it, brilliant.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128458,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1279972, Title: Treme, --- Description: Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bilko-1","dateCreated":"2010-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A major artistic achievement from David Simon","reviewBody":"My first impression, from watching episode one, was that the writing did not have the flow of "The Wire" it was trying too hard to register the many characters and to quickly tick off the various "types" that make up New Orleans society. Bunk and Freeman were too firmly placed in my memory for me to make the leap to Antoine and Albert. As for the Steve Zahn character, I instantly took a dislike to him and found him unrealistic in the extreme.

By the time we had reached the scene with the Big Chief emerging from the dark, I had become hooked. The characters started to make sense. The generous helping of musical scenes produced what must be the finest portrayal of live music and musicians I have ever seen. I could not wait to catch episode two.

I have now watched the first two episodes twice and all my first impressions have been blown away. Once you get to know the characters and can watch their introduction again, things start to make sense. Steve Zahn? What a brilliant comic creation. Just watch the intro to episode two, his creeping around Elvis Costello, his first day on the job. Absolutely first rate, The shocking introduction of violence, suddenly alters ones perceptions of a major character. Bunk, still lingers in the memory, but Antoine's blowing is going to change all that. I was not familiar with Khandi Alexander, but am now a major fan. Her performance is charismatic in the extreme.

I know that this series is not going to be to everyone's liking, but then neither is Shakespeare or Dickens. However, for those who enjoy a multi-faceted piece of work that can examine society in minute detail whilst never failing to entertain, this will surely rank as a major piece of American art.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,radio station,alternative music","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The White Lotus
The White Lotus
The White Lotus
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 S1 E3 Wir sind nur Affen
programme.desc: The White Lotus: Created by Mike White. With Jennifer Coolidge, Murray Bartlett, Connie Britton, Alexandra Daddario. Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13406094/","name":"The White Lotus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1YjY1MWUtYWY5Yi00YTM4LTkyM2UtMDQ3NmFiYTkyYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13406094/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ce3"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"To those annoyed with the loudness of the music in episode 2..","reviewBody":"I believe the use of the music in episode 2, nearly overpowering the dialogue in some sections, was intentionally done to further enhance the unsettling mood of the entire episode. There's a lot bubbling under the surface of these characters, and it's about to start boiling over soon.\n\nIf you don't like many of these characters and find them hard to root for, that's intentional too. Mike White writes characters that challenge you and leave you feeling conflicted. He wants us to have an inner dialogue with ourselves as we watch. As to what's around the corner, I can pretty much guarantee you we have no idea (unless you've read the scripts). But fasten your seatbelts, it's gonna be a bumpy ride.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":43443,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-11","keywords":"male explicit nudity,satire,social commentary,one week time span,social satire","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177639/","name":"Jennifer Coolidge"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058864/","name":"Murray Bartlett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0110168/","name":"Connie Britton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193472/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925234/","name":"Mike White"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1544732697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Among the employees at The White Lotus are the fastidious resort manager Armond (Murray Bartlett), who, after a sudden trauma, begins a dramatic downward spiral - and the down-to-earth spa manager, Belinda (Natasha Rothwell) who gets taken on an emotional roller coaster ride by a needy guest. The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0374463, Title: The Pacific, --- Description: The Pacific: With James Badge Dale, Joseph Mazzello, Jon Seda, Ashton Holmes. The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gezmek","dateCreated":"2010-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth the time","reviewBody":"I enjoyed this series very much and can see why there has been so many comparisons with Band Of Brothers. My observation is that in The Pacific many of the characters lack depth and development. The result was that I cared less when ill befell them than I did in Band of Brothers. I think that the first episode could have contained a lot more time letting us get to know the characters better before throwing them into battle.\n\nThe battle scenes were done very well and played very realistically. All in all HBO has done it again. Without the HBO and Showtime I think that US grown TV drama would be pretty thin on the ground. The Pacific is well worth the time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106218,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-14","keywords":"world war two,pacific theater,japanese soldier,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."</script><metacontent="

True Blood
True Blood
programme.sub-title: S3 E11 S3 E11 Frisches Blut
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Bgb217","dateCreated":"2002-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent, one of the best shows I've ever seen.","reviewBody":"It's hard to describe to those who haven't watched this brilliant show what it's like. Six Feet Under is simply in my opinion, the best hour on television, and one of the best shows ever. Of all time. Brilliantly written, brilliantly told, brilliantly acted, brilliantly brilliant. I've never used brilliant so much in a review before. 

 First off, it's a show about a very real family, with very real issues to deal with. The family, who have just recently lost the father consists of the mother Ruth, two sons Nate and David, and sister Claire. The two brothers run the business prviously owned by the father, a funeral parlor. I just love this show. There is not a single bad actor on the show, in every role. The family is probably one of the most real ever portrayed on TV, the characters being all easily relatable to, I myself can relate to two of them in particular. It's fresh, at times funny, at times sad, at times everything. Every single actor is amazing in their roles from Brenda to David to Keith to Ruth to Frederico to everybody. And the story lines are just so brilliant, dealing with life and it's purpose, seen throught the eyes of these people who work with death in a funeral home. It's just amazing.

 I could rave on and on for hours about how great this show is and how much I love it, but I have to stop sometime. If you haven't yet watched Six Feet Under please do yourself a favor and do. I love it and it's one of my all time favorite shows. Simply, yes, you guessed it, brilliant.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128458,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.title: Treme
Treme
programme.sub-title: S2 E3 On Your Way Down
programme.desc:
Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bilko-1"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A major artistic achievement from David Simon","reviewBody":"My first impression, from watching episode one, was that the writing did not have the flow of "The Wire" it was trying too hard to register the many characters and to quickly tick off the various "types" that make up New Orleans society. Bunk and Freeman were too firmly placed in my memory for me to make the leap to Antoine and Albert. As for the Steve Zahn character, I instantly took a dislike to him and found him unrealistic in the extreme.

By the time we had reached the scene with the Big Chief emerging from the dark, I had become hooked. The characters started to make sense. The generous helping of musical scenes produced what must be the finest portrayal of live music and musicians I have ever seen. I could not wait to catch episode two.

I have now watched the first two episodes twice and all my first impressions have been blown away. Once you get to know the characters and can watch their introduction again, things start to make sense. Steve Zahn? What a brilliant comic creation. Just watch the intro to episode two, his creeping around Elvis Costello, his first day on the job. Absolutely first rate, The shocking introduction of violence, suddenly alters ones perceptions of a major character. Bunk, still lingers in the memory, but Antoine's blowing is going to change all that. I was not familiar with Khandi Alexander, but am now a major fan. Her performance is charismatic in the extreme.

I know that this series is not going to be to everyone's liking, but then neither is Shakespeare or Dickens. However, for those who enjoy a multi-faceted piece of work that can examine society in minute detail whilst never failing to entertain, this will surely rank as a major piece of American art.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,radio station,alternative music","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1279972, Title: Treme, --- Description: Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bilko-1","dateCreated":"2010-04-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A major artistic achievement from David Simon","reviewBody":"My first impression, from watching episode one, was that the writing did not have the flow of "The Wire" it was trying too hard to register the many characters and to quickly tick off the various "types" that make up New Orleans society. Bunk and Freeman were too firmly placed in my memory for me to make the leap to Antoine and Albert. As for the Steve Zahn character, I instantly took a dislike to him and found him unrealistic in the extreme.

By the time we had reached the scene with the Big Chief emerging from the dark, I had become hooked. The characters started to make sense. The generous helping of musical scenes produced what must be the finest portrayal of live music and musicians I have ever seen. I could not wait to catch episode two.

I have now watched the first two episodes twice and all my first impressions have been blown away. Once you get to know the characters and can watch their introduction again, things start to make sense. Steve Zahn? What a brilliant comic creation. Just watch the intro to episode two, his creeping around Elvis Costello, his first day on the job. Absolutely first rate, The shocking introduction of violence, suddenly alters ones perceptions of a major character. Bunk, still lingers in the memory, but Antoine's blowing is going to change all that. I was not familiar with Khandi Alexander, but am now a major fan. Her performance is charismatic in the extreme.

I know that this series is not going to be to everyone's liking, but then neither is Shakespeare or Dickens. However, for those who enjoy a multi-faceted piece of work that can examine society in minute detail whilst never failing to entertain, this will surely rank as a major piece of American art.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14232,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,radio station,alternative music","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Scream 3
Scream 3
programme.desc:
Scream 3: Directed by Wes Craven. With Liev Schreiber, Beth Toussaint, Roger Jackson, Kelly Rutherford. While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0134084/","name":"Scream 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDljNmI1YzctNjJlZC00NzZlLWFlZTgtMDE4MjJiMDk0ZGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg3MDQ0Mjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0134084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drownnnsoda"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Decent Finale, But Can't Compete With The First Two.","reviewBody":""Scream 3" takes us to the Northern California hills, where Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) is living in seclusion and immense fear due to the traumatic events that she survived in Woodsboro and at Windsor College. Meanwhile, a Hollywood movie studio is producing a film called "Stab 3", the third installment in a movie series based on the events that Sidney has survived. But when cast and crew members begin to die off one by one, it seems another killer has returned, and goes after the fragile Sidney (who is having terrifying visions of her dead mother). Sidney teams up with Gale Weathers (Courteney Cox) and policeman Dewey (David Arquette), two people who survived the massacres with Sidney, and try to uncover the new killers identity, which may be linked to Sidney's past.

The last installment in a very popular horror series, "Scream 3" brings this trilogy to end on an entertaining but rather weak note. The script for this film is nowhere near as good as the other two, which is unfortunate considering this film was the "finale" of the series. It would have been nice to end the series with a better film - not that this sequel is unbearably bad, but it could have been better. I will admit there are some decent scare moments and a handful of suspenseful scenes, but it seems to me that there's almost too much going on in this sequel for it's own good. The script juggles the Sidney character, Sidney's past, the Dewey/Gail relationship, the cast members of the "Stab 3" movie, and more, and the jumping around hurt the film a little. It didn't seem to have a central point within it, and that was a problem, for me at least.

Besides the problems that it has, I still have to say that I enjoyed this movie, mostly because of the entertainment factor. The writing wasn't amazing, but it did manage to continue to have some nice plot developments and a few good twists, plus some decent scares and more slight mocking of the genre and it's rules. The setting is mainly Hollywood, so this film has a completely different atmosphere than the second or the first film. I'm not sure if it necessarily hurt the film, but it seemed a little too "Hollywood" for me. The cast is good here, with more returning characters and some new ones as well, mainly added for body count, while the others do develop somewhat during the movie. The twist-ending (which is the revelation of the killer's identity) made sense in terms of the story, but I found it to be a little unsatisfying.

All things considered, "Scream 3" is an enjoyable but problematic ending to an above-average horror trilogy. You'll be entertained undoubtedly, but this movie can't compete with the second or the first films, because it just isn't as good. I enjoyed it for the most part and I have trouble over-criticizing it, but most people will agree when I say that it can't compare with the original film. 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":131084,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-02-04","keywords":"mystery killer,serial killer,masked killer,tape over mouth,horror icon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scream 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi914204185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZjBiODktNTk0Zi00YTg0LThkZjMtMmFkMWZlNTg1MWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZjBiODktNTk0Zi00YTg0LThkZjMtMmFkMWZlNTg1MWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT#1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000274/","name":"David Arquette"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001073/","name":"Courteney Cox"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013899/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Liev Schreiber (role=Cotton Weary), Beth Toussaint (role=Female Caller), Roger Jackson (role=The Voice), Kelly Rutherford (role=Christine), Neve Campbell (role=Sidney Prescott), Courteney Cox (role=Gale Weathers), Julie Janney (role=Moderator), Richmond Arquette (role=Student), Patrick Dempsey (role=Mark Kincaid), Lynn McRee (role=Maureen Prescott), Nancy O'Dell (role=Female Reporter), Ken Taylor (role=Male Reporter)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0134084, Title: Scream 3, --- Description: Scream 3: Directed by Wes Craven. With Liev Schreiber, Beth Toussaint, Roger Jackson, Kelly Rutherford. While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0134084/","name":"Scream 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDljNmI1YzctNjJlZC00NzZlLWFlZTgtMDE4MjJiMDk0ZGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg3MDQ0Mjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0134084/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"drownnnsoda","dateCreated":"2007-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Decent Finale, But Can't Compete With The First Two.","reviewBody":""Scream 3" takes us to the Northern California hills, where Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) is living in seclusion and immense fear due to the traumatic events that she survived in Woodsboro and at Windsor College. Meanwhile, a Hollywood movie studio is producing a film called "Stab 3", the third installment in a movie series based on the events that Sidney has survived. But when cast and crew members begin to die off one by one, it seems another killer has returned, and goes after the fragile Sidney (who is having terrifying visions of her dead mother). Sidney teams up with Gale Weathers (Courteney Cox) and policeman Dewey (David Arquette), two people who survived the massacres with Sidney, and try to uncover the new killers identity, which may be linked to Sidney's past.

The last installment in a very popular horror series, "Scream 3" brings this trilogy to end on an entertaining but rather weak note. The script for this film is nowhere near as good as the other two, which is unfortunate considering this film was the "finale" of the series. It would have been nice to end the series with a better film - not that this sequel is unbearably bad, but it could have been better. I will admit there are some decent scare moments and a handful of suspenseful scenes, but it seems to me that there's almost too much going on in this sequel for it's own good. The script juggles the Sidney character, Sidney's past, the Dewey/Gail relationship, the cast members of the "Stab 3" movie, and more, and the jumping around hurt the film a little. It didn't seem to have a central point within it, and that was a problem, for me at least.

Besides the problems that it has, I still have to say that I enjoyed this movie, mostly because of the entertainment factor. The writing wasn't amazing, but it did manage to continue to have some nice plot developments and a few good twists, plus some decent scares and more slight mocking of the genre and it's rules. The setting is mainly Hollywood, so this film has a completely different atmosphere than the second or the first film. I'm not sure if it necessarily hurt the film, but it seemed a little too "Hollywood" for me. The cast is good here, with more returning characters and some new ones as well, mainly added for body count, while the others do develop somewhat during the movie. The twist-ending (which is the revelation of the killer's identity) made sense in terms of the story, but I found it to be a little unsatisfying.

All things considered, "Scream 3" is an enjoyable but problematic ending to an above-average horror trilogy. You'll be entertained undoubtedly, but this movie can't compete with the second or the first films, because it just isn't as good. I enjoyed it for the most part and I have trouble over-criticizing it, but most people will agree when I say that it can't compare with the original film. 6/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":131084,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-02-04","keywords":"mystery killer,serial killer,masked killer,tape over mouth,horror icon","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scream 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi914204185","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZjBiODktNTk0Zi00YTg0LThkZjMtMmFkMWZlNTg1MWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZjBiODktNTk0Zi00YTg0LThkZjMtMmFkMWZlNTg1MWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT#1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000274/","name":"David Arquette","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001073/","name":"Courteney Cox"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010901/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013899/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="
